description: Spoken 'period' at the end of a sentence should be converted to an actual period symbol
spokenText: I need to finish the report by Friday period
expectedOutput: I need to finish the report by Friday.

description: Spoken 'comma' between list items should be converted to actual comma symbols
spokenText: we need apples comma oranges comma and bananas
expectedOutput: We need apples, oranges, and bananas.

description: Spoken 'new line' and 'new paragraph' should be converted to actual line and paragraph breaks
spokenText: first point new line second point new paragraph moving on to the next topic
expectedOutput:
First point
Second point

Moving on to the next topic.

assertions.value: Moving on to the next topic

description: Spoken 'question mark' at the end of a sentence should be converted to an actual question mark symbol
spokenText: are you coming to the party question mark
expectedOutput: Are you coming to the party?

description: The word 'period' used as a noun referring to a time span must NOT be converted to a punctuation symbol
spokenText: the period of the Renaissance was a fascinating time in history
expectedOutput: The period of the Renaissance was a fascinating time in history.
